Package GrammarNotions.ECFGNodes

Provides classes defining the different kinds of ECFG nodes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CAltNode  
    CECFGAbstractListNode
    CECFGAbstractListNode is an abstract class which defines the common part of star, plus, multidot and tuple nodes: - It descends from CECFGNode - It has a list of subtrees - It is the ancestor of CStarNode, CPlusNode, CMultiDotNode and CTupleNode DO NOT CONFUSE WITH THE NO LONGER USED CLASS CECFGNodeList
    CECFGNode  
    CECFGNodeCodes  
    CEpsNode  
    CMultiDotNode  
    CMultiStickNode  
    CNonTermNode  
    COptionNode  
    CPlusNode  
    CStarNode  
    CTermNode  
    CTermValueNode  
    CTupleNode  
    ECFGTreeTransformations  

Package GrammarNotions.ECFGNodes Description

Provides classes defining the different kinds of ECFG nodes. These are used in the creation of parse trees.
